caption.center: PETER LOBECK, Appellant, v. STATE OF FLORIDA, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Fourth District.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Circuit Court for the Fifteenth Judicial Circuit, Palm Beach County, Hubert R. Lindsey, Judge, L.T. Case No. 03-10012CF A02.
opinion.attorneys:
Richard W. Springer of Richard W. Springer, P.A., Palm Springs, for appellant.
Charles J. Crist, Jr., Attorney General, Tallahassee, and Georgina Jimenez-Orosa, Assistant Attorney General, West Palm Beach, for appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
Affirmed.
GUNTHER, POLEN and MAY, JJ., concur.
Not final until disposition of timely filed motion forrehearing.
